article: oakland -- the victims , described only as males , reported the incident to police at the macarthur bart station about 7:50 , said bart spokesman christopher filippi . `` one suffered a laceration to the face , '' filippi said . `` another a laceration to the arm . `` filippi said the injuries were not life arrests had been made as of late friday police closed the macarthur station until about 8:50 to collect evidence . warm springs and sfo trains will stop there but richmond and antioch trains will details about the altercation , including a description of the suspect , were not immediately altercation occurred about an hour after a vigil for 18-year-old nia wilson , who was stabbed to death at the station on july 22 .

john cowell , 27 , of concord , has been charged with her has seen several other violent episodes in the past month . on the same day wilson was killed , 47-year-old don stevens died of injuries he suffered in an attack at the bay fair station in san leandro on july 21 . and an assault at the pleasant hill station on july 18 left another man dead . none of the cases are believed to be back for updates .
abstract: Two slashed in fight aboard Richmond-bond train
